title: Album Page, "Architectural Details, Buhlerthal [sic]", September 21, 1887
medium: Graphite on cream paperboard tipped into binding with fabric
inscribed: Recto, in graphite, clockwise from upper left corner: 64; rounded timber work; watershed; a jolly little corner dormer; (inscribed in circle) 52 / (written along right edge of sheet) ok...; Buhlerthal - Black Forest / Sept 21st 1887; a mill / the corner building / nearest grows / larger as it joins / the main building - / very pretty.
description: Vertical sheet containing three sketches of buildings.  At top left is the upper section of a half-timbered structure. At top right is a timber building with a tall tiled roof with a small dormer at the corner.  At center is a half-timber building with smaller shed at the front, and a water source flows from under the building's right corner.

tombstone.epitaph:
Album Page, "Architectural Details, Buhlerthal [sic]", September 21, 1887.
September 21, 1887. Graphite on cream paperboard tipped into binding with fabric. Gift of Mrs. William Greenough. 1943-51-132.
